@marcorubio I don’t trust F*X news. But actual journalists? I believe their findings, methodology, principles, facts, and truth-telling far more than I believe mendacious, corrupt politicians whose only concerns are their corporate donors.

@JosephAMorales You were fantastic in the show last night. Such energy and passion. Thanks for coming out in the heat after the show and talking to fans. Looking forward to seeing you again in five months in Durham!

@NikkyWalks I saw you last night and was blown away by the energy, freshness, and passion of the entire company. And that after four shows in two days in this heat? Today will be on 🔥 in the best way. Also: The move to Des Moines puts you that much closer to Durham so bring it on!

It’s 2:30 am, & I’m still processing the Philip tour @HamiltonMusical. @NikkyWalks, you broke me in The World Was Wide Enough; I may never get those pieces back. Applause to entire company for making my seventh time as fresh as the first. I’ll be waiting in Durham for you all!
